title: Closed Interval Method
description: Interactive simulation demonstrating the Closed Interval Method for finding absolute extrema on closed intervals. Students work through a three-step process: finding candidates (critical points and endpoints), evaluating the function at each candidate, and identifying the absolute maximum and minimum values.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Calculus
